bibl.title: Mısır-Alexandria Greko-Romen Müzesi'nde Bulunan Düğme Formlu Mühürler. [Button-type Amphora Stamps in the Greco-Roman Museum in Alexandria - Egypt.]
bibl.note: Present the button-type amphora stamps bearing the names of Hieroteles, other producers of Rhodian Peraea inspired by Hieroteles and the eponyms.- Avec résumé en turc et en anglais.
bibl.seg: Gonca Cankardeş-Şenol & Emel Canoğlu, Mısır-Alexandria Greko-Romen Müzesi'nde Bulunan Düğme Formlu Mühürler. [Button-type Amphora Stamps in the Greco-Roman Museum in Alexandria - Egypt.]
Present the button-type amphora stamps bearing the names of Hieroteles, other producers of Rhodian Peraea inspired by Hieroteles and the eponyms.- Avec résumé en turc et en anglais.
